short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No more typing or dictating: Shine autoscribing does it for you. Just talk and watch your words appear on the screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No more typing or dictating: Shine AI autoscribing does it for you. Just talk and watch your words appear on the screen. Shine's technology removes filler words and captures your tone and voice and works with over 100 languages.
